name: Completed Tasks Summary (Last 24h)
query:
customEvents
| where timestamp between (ago(1d) .. now())
| where name == "CIPP.TaskCompleted"
| extend TaskName   = tostring(customDimensions.TaskName)
       , Command    = tostring(customDimensions.Command)
       , Tenant     = tostring(customDimensions.Tenant)
       , DurationMs = todouble(customMeasurements.DurationMs)
| summarize
    Count          = count(),
    TotalDurationMs = sum(DurationMs),
    AvgDurationMs   = avg(DurationMs),
    MaxDurationMs   = max(DurationMs)
  by TaskName, Command, Tenant
| order by TotalDurationMs desc
